title: 01/10/22 DPS Hour 1 Louis Riddick
itunes:title: 01/10/22 DPS Hour 1 Louis Riddick
description:
Louis Riddick talks to Dan about all the NFL coaches that are getting fired today. Louis tells Dan his thoughts on the Raiders playing for a tie.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
